alert.note: Alert for Langlade (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:55PM CDT until June 03 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Langlade County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation, or 13 miles south of Crandon, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pearson around 400 PM CDT. Veterans Memorial County Park around 415 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
